meanings.sent1: The riskers at the casino bet all their money on one game.
meanings.sent2: Riskers like to try new things and explore unknown territories.
meanings.sent3: The riskers decided to go skydiving without checking their parachutes.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the risker of the group, always pushing boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The riskers faced the roaring waves with determination and courage.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in risky behavior.
meanings.sent1: The riskers ignored the warning signs and went surfing during a storm.
meanings.sent2: Riskers often find themselves in dangerous situations due to their choices.
meanings.sent3: The riskers thought it would be fun to swim with sharks without a cage.
meanings.sent4: He joined a group of riskers who loved to climb mountains without safety gear.
meanings.sent5: The riskers were adrenaline junkies, always seeking the next thrill.
